name: ExplosiveLife
description:
This was a a game i challenged myself to make in a few days.

When you start the game you only have half health.

You must jump along platforms and try to collect black orbs to increase your health.

If you get to close to the dynamite it will explode and you will use health. 

if your health gets to zero, you lose, if you get your health to full, you win.

Controls:

A - Move left

D - Move right

Space - Jump

Good Luck!
